post.title: free 3d glasses
post.content: hello i bought a 42gt30b from 365 electrical 4weeks ago it should have came with 2 free pairs of glasses but still waiting for then all i get when i phone them is they are waiting for panasonic to send then out is there anyone else who is waiting for theres it so annoying as they did not say that i would have to wait for them when i ordered the tv cheers lee
